name: Surreality Of My Heart
description:
You wake up in the town Kaleidoscope, you're new and don't know anyone. Your four quirky neighbours are excited to meet you. Why not say hi!

Multiple endings good and bad and a few extra for attempting two characters at the same time.

Five characters and one secret character.

Meet your neighbours!

Mie Fitzgerald                                                                                                                                                               19                                                                                                                                                                                 The happy go lucky but loud girl next door full of love and energy. She stills lives with  her parents and is very much a daddy's girl.

Bucky Cranius                                                                                                                                                               19                                                                                                                                                                                        The slow witted beach lover with nerdy interests. She is close friends with Mie knowing her since childhood. Bucky loves sharks and the popular CCG Gogo cards.

Aubrey Dowski                                                                                                                                                             40                                                                                                                                                                                         The coot who works at the local themed restaurant. Her popularity among the townsfolk is iffy to say the least, he closest friend is a puppet (and it's not even her's).

Winnipeg Kokoro                                                                                                                                                        21                                                                                                                                                                                          The strange woman with a penchant for hand puppets. Disliked amongst  the cast for her apparent creepiness, screaming faces is a prominent theme throughout her clothes and home. 

Roland Avery                                                                                                                                                                 21                                                                                                                                                                                         The conspiratorial puppet of Winnipeg.  He is close friends with Aubrey, though has been banned from the restaurant. It is just a puppet of course, why would you want to talk to a puppet?

"I'd give it a 9\10 but I'm pretty biased on this matter" - Aubrey "I enjoyed this game. It's pretty neat" - You (I hope)
